title: The Kalahari desert people
creator_credit: National Geographic Society, Dennis B. Kane, Nicholas Clapp, Robert Young and John Marshall
brief_description: Examines the social and cultural changes being made by the bushmen of southern Africa’s Kalahari Desert as modern influences change traditional patterns of living and they become farmer-herders after thousands of years of being hunter-gatherers.
